A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Regrettably\, I didn't like this film.  The humor was over-the-top as was some of the action (i.e. one character being blown into space and surviving).  New characters and good actors seemed unecessary and wasted\, respectively.  I did like some of the character development and plot but overall I was disappointed in this film more than any other star wars film\, including the prequels.  This film made me less interested in seeing the next one and I thought I was a lifelong Star Wars fan\, having seen the original when I was 6.
